title: This one has it all: pie chart instead of a bar graph, pie chart total is >100%, and it lists the margin of error as its source
author: FuriousJazzHands
remarks:
Percentages do not add up.
False description on data source.
Poll results at three different times are not whole-part relationship.
Better to use line chart over pie chart.
Use specified years in labels instead of "Today", "Last Year" and 
"1997".
